name: Avatar Musik World
description:
Whether its dancing, fashion or just chilling with friends, AVATAR MUSIK WORLD provides the perfect social community for friends to meet up and have fun.

AMW FEATURES gives players more than just dance:

- Free to Play with Instant Access
- Dancing : dance alone or with up to 6 other friends
- Social : link with up to 100 Friends for private IM Chat
- Music : the hottest and most popular songs
- World : interesting places to unlock and explore - Beach, Downtown, Park, Private Yacht
- Fashion : show your style or just have fun with cosplay
- Fun : dance rooms with a range of privacy settings
- Fresh : new events, songs and features added monthly
- Rewards : earn in-game credits via game play and daily log-in
- Community : earn bonus rewards via animal vet, farmer, police and hero challenges

PLEASE NOTE:
AMW requires a stable internet connection.
We recommend a strong WIFI connection for the initial download.

KEEP UPDATED AND CSR HELP!
Connect with us for the latest Avatar Musik news, contests or customer service help: www.teamobi.com
